mapper.sql: id as id , universityId as universityId , areaId as areaId , year as year , batch as batch , majorType as majorType , realEnrollingNumber as realEnrollingNumber , highestScore as highestScore , lowestScore as lowestScore , averageScore as averageScore , proScore as proScore , schoolFee as schoolFee , lengthOfSchooling as lengthOfSchooling , highestPrecedence as highestPrecedence , lowestPrecedence as lowestPrecedence , averagePrecedence as averagePrecedence , planEnrollingNumber as planEnrollingNumber , createDate as createDate , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , is_delete as isDelete , flag1 as flag1 , flag2 as flag2 , flag3 as flag3 , flag4 as flag4 , flag5 as flag5
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_university_enrolling ( universityId, areaId, year, batch, majorType, realEnrollingNumber, highestScore, lowestScore, averageScore, proScore, schoolFee, lengthOfSchooling, highestPrecedence, lowestPrecedence, averagePrecedence, planEnrollingNumber, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, is_delete, flag1, flag2, flag3, flag4, flag5 ) VALUES ( #{universityId}, #{areaId}, #{year}, #{batch}, #{majorType}, #{realEnrollingNumber}, #{highestScore}, #{lowestScore}, #{averageScore}, #{proScore}, #{schoolFee}, #{lengthOfSchooling}, #{highestPrecedence}, #{lowestPrecedence}, #{averagePrecedence}, #{planEnrollingNumber}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{isDelete}, #{flag1}, #{flag2}, #{flag3}, #{flag4}, #{flag5} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_university_enrolling
universityId = #{universityId},
areaId = #{areaId},
year = #{year},
batch = #{batch},
majorType = #{majorType},
realEnrollingNumber = #{realEnrollingNumber},
highestScore = #{highestScore},
lowestScore = #{lowestScore},
averageScore = #{averageScore},
proScore = #{proScore},
schoolFee = #{schoolFee},
lengthOfSchooling = #{lengthOfSchooling},
highestPrecedence = #{highestPrecedence},
lowestPrecedence = #{lowestPrecedence},
averagePrecedence = #{averagePrecedence},
planEnrollingNumber = #{planEnrollingNumber},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
flag1 = #{flag1},
flag2 = #{flag2},
flag3 = #{flag3},
flag4 = #{flag4},
flag5 = #{flag5},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_university_enrolling
universityId = #{map.universityId},
areaId = #{map.areaId},
year = #{map.year},
batch = #{map.batch},
majorType = #{map.majorType},
realEnrollingNumber = #{map.realEnrollingNumber},

lowestScore = #{map.lowestScore},

schoolFee = #{map.schoolFee},

lowestPrecedence = #{map.lowestPrecedence},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_university_enrolling ( universityId, areaId, year, batch, majorType, realEnrollingNumber, highestScore, lowestScore, averageScore, proScore, schoolFee, lengthOfSchooling, highestPrecedence, lowestPrecedence, averagePrecedence, planEnrollingNumber, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, is_delete, flag1, flag2, flag3, flag4, flag5 ) VALUES ( #{map.universityId}, #{map.areaId}, #{map.year}, #{map.batch}, #{map.majorType}, #{map.realEnrollingNumber}, #{map.highestScore}, #{map.lowestScore}, #{map.averageScore}, #{map.proScore}, #{map.schoolFee}, #{map.lengthOfSchooling}, #{map.highestPrecedence}, #{map.lowestPrecedence}, #{map.averagePrecedence}, #{map.planEnrollingNumber}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.isDelete}, #{map.flag1}, #{map.flag2}, #{map.flag3}, #{map.flag4}, #{map.flag5} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, universityId
, areaId
, year
, batch
, majorType
, realEnrollingNumber
, highestScore
, lowestScore
, averageScore
, proScore
, schoolFee
, lengthOfSchooling
, highestPrecedence
, lowestPrecedence
, averagePrecedence
, planEnrollingNumber
, createDate
, creator
, lastModDate
, lastModifier
, is_delete
, flag1
, flag2
, flag3
, flag4
, flag5
FROM zgk_university_enrolling
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND universityId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityId} , '%')
AND areaId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.areaId} , '%')
AND year like CONCAT('%', #{condition.year} , '%')
AND batch like CONCAT('%', #{condition.batch} , '%')
AND majorType like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorType} , '%')
AND realEnrollingNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.realEnrollingNumber} , '%')
AND highestScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.highestScore} , '%')
AND lowestScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lowestScore} , '%')
AND averageScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.averageScore} , '%')
AND proScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.proScore} , '%')
AND schoolFee like CONCAT('%', #{condition.schoolFee} , '%')
AND lengthOfSchooling like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lengthOfSchooling} , '%')
AND highestPrecedence like CONCAT('%', #{condition.highestPrecedence} , '%')
AND lowestPrecedence like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lowestPrecedence} , '%')
AND averagePrecedence like CONCAT('%', #{condition.averagePrecedence} , '%')
AND planEnrollingNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.planEnrollingNumber} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND is_delete like CONCAT('%', #{condition.isDelete} , '%')
AND flag1 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.flag1} , '%')
AND flag2 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.flag2} , '%')
AND flag3 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.flag3} , '%')
AND flag4 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.flag4} , '%')
AND flag5 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.flag5} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
